CHILDHOOD:
He grew up in the city of Kolkata (Also known as 'City of Joy'), India.
He is the only child and spent more of his time with his mom as his dad is always on business tour.%[I want more](postback:morechildhood)

MOREEDUCATION1: After finishing his A Levels, Jay did his undergrad from WBUT majoring in Biotechnology. He moved to Manchester, UK to finish is postgrad majoring in Bioinformatics
